{"step_by_step_thinking": "Soft tissue sarcoma is a type of cancer that begins in the soft tissues of the body. The prognosis of soft tissue sarcoma can depend on various factors, including the size, grade, and location of the tumor, as well as the patient's overall health. Tumor depth is another factor that can influence prognosis. Deeper tumors may be more difficult to remove completely and may be more likely to spread to other parts of the body. Therefore, tumor depth should be considered when determining the prognosis of soft tissue sarcoma.", "answer_choice": "A"}
